content:
SiteMapDataSourceDesigner Class

In this Article

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner control.

Syntax

Declaration

public class SiteMapDataSourceDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner, System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ComponentDesigner
  • HtmlControlDesigner
  • ControlDesigner
  • System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner
  • SiteMapDataSourceDesigner

Constructors

  • SiteMapDataSourceDesigner()

    Creates an instance of the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner class.

    public SiteMapDataSourceDesigner ();

Properties

  • CanRefreshSchema

    Gets a value indicating whether the schema can be refreshed.

    public override bool CanRefreshSchema { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      This implementation always returns true.

Methods

  • GetView(String)

    Gets the DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView for the specified view.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView GetView (string viewPath);

    Parameters

    • viewPath
      String

      The XPath query for the part of the data source to retrieve.

    Returns

    • DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView

      A DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView object.

  • GetViewNames()

    Gets an array of names representing named views in the data source.

    public virtual string[] GetViewNames ();

    Returns

    • String[]

      This implementation always returns an empty string array.

    Remarks

    Named views are not implemented in this data source designer. Views are retrieved based on an XPath query rather than name.

  • Initialize(IComponent)

    Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.

    public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);

    Parameters

    • component
      IComponent

      The component.

  • OnComponentChanged(Object,ComponentChangedEventArgs)

    Called when the associated component changes.

    public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • sender
      Object

      The object that raised the event.

    • e
      ComponentChangedEventArgs

      A ComponentChangedEventArgs object containing information about the event.

    Remarks

    The OnComponentChanged also calls the base OnComponentChanged method, which raises the ComponentChanged event, and also calls the OnDataSourceChanged method which raises the DataSourceChanged event.

  • RefreshSchema(Boolean)

    Called by the designer host to refresh the schema of the underlying data source.

    public override void RefreshSchema (bool preferSilent);

    Parameters

    • preferSilent
      Boolean

      true to suppress data source events until the refresh operation has completed; otherwise, false.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure*.

    bool System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure { get; }

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the underlying data source has a configuration wizard that can be launched with the Configure method; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema*.

    bool System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema { get; }

    Returns

    • Boolean

      Always true.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.Configure()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.Configure ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.GetView(String)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView*.

    System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView IDataSourceDesigner.GetView (string viewName);

    Parameters

    • viewName
      String

      The name of the view to get.

    Returns

    • DesignerDataSourceView

      A designer data-source view that contains information about the identified view, or null if a view with the specified name is not found.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames*.

    string[] IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames ();

    Returns

    • String[]

      The names of the views in the underlying data source.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(Boolean)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema (bool preferSilent);

    Parameters

    • preferSilent
      Boolean

      true suppresses data source events until the refresh is finished.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*

    void IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.
